      • sendMail

        void sendMail(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String mailid,
              OrderInfo orderInfo,
              java.util.List<OrderItemInfo> orderitems)
        Send order confirmation mail with order details to the user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username as entered by the user in the shipping address page.
        mailid - The mailid of the user to which the order confirmation mail needs to be sent.
        orderInfo - The order info which gives details of the order
        orderitems - The orderitem which gives details of the individual order items.
